title: shumai peridenrE
sahitya:
shumai peridEnenru tuyar peridAgi nI shOrvura vENDAm tuNai avanuLLAn


anupallavi

  amaivuDan avan tAn aghamadirk-koNDE bhuvimishai vAzhvAi punmaigaL tavirvAi


caraNam    iraiyavan mElE kurai pala kUriDEl enrumavan sheyalgaL iyangiDum nItiyAl 
nirai kuDam tanaip-pOlE ninriDuvAi vAzhvil nimalanun tiram kaNDE nigaril padam taruvAn
